name: Trunk Number
title: TRN
definition: Identifies a specific customer trunk number or trunk number range.
validEntryNotes: A four numeric entry or range of four numeric entries.
usageNotes: Required when the RT field is “F” and the TRN field on the Trunking and/or ACI Form is populated, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: Trunk number component in the message format is a variable length, one to four character numeric code and trunk numbers of fewer than 4 characters are left justified with remaining spaces not filled. Leading zeros are not to be used as part of the trunk number.  However, the trunk number zero is allowed.
